name: partial-picking-system
description: Production-Ready Partial Picking System PWA with dual authentication, real-time weight scales, and offline capability
author: Newly Weds Foods Thailand

scripts.dev:all: npm run clean:ports && concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
